mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.OTHER_ADDRESSES as otherAddresses, a.OTHER_CITY as otherCity, a.OTHER_PROVINCE as otherProvince, a.OTHER_COUNTRY as otherCountry, a.OTHER_ZIP_CODE as otherZipCode, a.YES_TAX_NUMBER as yesTaxNumber, a.NO_TAX_NUMBER as noTaxNumber, a.REASON as reason, a.AUTHENTIC_DATA as authenticData, a.AGREE_TAX_ORDINANCE as agreeTaxOrdinance, a.PROVEN_ITSELF as provenItself, a.CONSENT as consent, a.SIGNATURE_DATE as signatureDate, a.SIGNATURE as signature, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_CRS( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , OTHER_ADDRESSES , OTHER_CITY , OTHER_PROVINCE , OTHER_COUNTRY , OTHER_ZIP_CODE , YES_TAX_NUMBER , NO_TAX_NUMBER , REASON , AUTHENTIC_DATA , AGREE_TAX_ORDINANCE , PROVEN_ITSELF , CONSENT , SIGNATURE_DATE , SIGNATURE , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{otherAddresses} , #{otherCity} , #{otherProvince} , #{otherCountry} , #{otherZipCode} , #{yesTaxNumber} , #{noTaxNumber} , #{reason} , #{authenticData} , #{agreeTaxOrdinance} , #{provenItself} , #{consent} , #{signatureDate} , #{signature} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_CRS
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
OTHER_ADDRESSES = #{otherAddresses} ,
OTHER_CITY = #{otherCity} ,
OTHER_PROVINCE = #{otherProvince} ,
OTHER_COUNTRY = #{otherCountry} ,
OTHER_ZIP_CODE = #{otherZipCode} ,
YES_TAX_NUMBER = #{yesTaxNumber} ,
NO_TAX_NUMBER = #{noTaxNumber} ,
REASON = #{reason} ,
AUTHENTIC_DATA = #{authenticData} ,
AGREE_TAX_ORDINANCE = #{agreeTaxOrdinance} ,
PROVEN_ITSELF = #{provenItself} ,
CONSENT = #{consent} ,
SIGNATURE_DATE = #{signatureDate} ,
SIGNATURE = #{signature} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_CRS( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , OTHER_ADDRESSES , OTHER_CITY , OTHER_PROVINCE , OTHER_COUNTRY , OTHER_ZIP_CODE , YES_TAX_NUMBER , NO_TAX_NUMBER , REASON , AUTHENTIC_DATA , AGREE_TAX_ORDINANCE , PROVEN_ITSELF , CONSENT , SIGNATURE_DATE , SIGNATURE , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.otherAddresses} , #{item.otherCity} , #{item.otherProvince} , #{item.otherCountry} , #{item.otherZipCode} , #{item.yesTaxNumber} , #{item.noTaxNumber} , #{item.reason} , #{item.authenticData} , #{item.agreeTaxOrdinance} , #{item.provenItself} , #{item.consent} , #{item.signatureDate} , #{item.signature} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_CRS SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , OTHER_ADDRESSES = #{item.otherAddresses} , OTHER_CITY = #{item.otherCity} , OTHER_PROVINCE = #{item.otherProvince} , OTHER_COUNTRY = #{item.otherCountry} , OTHER_ZIP_CODE = #{item.otherZipCode} , YES_TAX_NUMBER = #{item.yesTaxNumber} , NO_TAX_NUMBER = #{item.noTaxNumber} , REASON = #{item.reason} , AUTHENTIC_DATA = #{item.authenticData} , AGREE_TAX_ORDINANCE = #{item.agreeTaxOrdinance} , PROVEN_ITSELF = #{item.provenItself} , CONSENT = #{item.consent} , SIGNATURE_DATE = #{item.signatureDate} , SIGNATURE = #{item.signature} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_CRS SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , OTHER_ADDRESSES = #{otherAddresses} , OTHER_CITY = #{otherCity} , OTHER_PROVINCE = #{otherProvince} , OTHER_COUNTRY = #{otherCountry} , OTHER_ZIP_CODE = #{otherZipCode} , YES_TAX_NUMBER = #{yesTaxNumber} , NO_TAX_NUMBER = #{noTaxNumber} , REASON = #{reason} , AUTHENTIC_DATA = #{authenticData} , AGREE_TAX_ORDINANCE = #{agreeTaxOrdinance} , PROVEN_ITSELF = #{provenItself} , CONSENT = #{consent} , SIGNATURE_DATE = #{signatureDate} , SIGNATURE = #{signature} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PER_CRS a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
